mapper.select: select * from club_board_reply where club_board_no = #{clubBoardNo} order by club_board_reply_no asc
mapper.update: update club_board_reply set club_board_reply_content = #{clubBoardReplyContent} where club_board_reply_no = #{clubBoardReplyNo}
mapper.select: select * from club_member where club_no = #{clubNo} and club_member_id = #{clubMemberId}
SELECT count(*) FROM club_board_reply where club_board_no = #{clubBoardNo}

SELECT cm_reply.club_member_id AS reply_member_id, cm_reply.club_member_no AS reply_member_no, cm_board.club_member_id AS board_member_id, cm_board.club_member_no AS board_member_no, cb.club_board_title FROM club_member cm_reply JOIN CLUB_BOARD_REPLY cbr ON cbr.club_member_no = cm_reply.club_member_no JOIN club_board cb ON cb.club_board_no = cbr.club_board_no JOIN club_member cm_board ON cm_board.club_member_no = cb.club_member_no WHERE cbr.club_board_reply_no = #{clubBoardReplyNo}
